info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 3:22PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Herkimer, Montgomery and Southern Washington Counties. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to begin across the region Friday evening and become moderate to locally heavy Friday night into Saturday morning. Some sleet may mix in Friday night. Light to moderate snow will then continue into Saturday afternoon then taper off by Saturday evening. Snowfall rates may reach 1 to 2 inches per hour at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
